about_the_game:
Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game including 12 challenging levels wherein players must figure out how to conquer unique obstacles, enemies, and environments in zero-gravity, with bananas and head-banging music as your only motivation to carry on.

You play as one of countless test-monkeys sent to an evil space station for unethical evaluation where only the best of the best will survive, as players must:
• Survive space-junk, deadly robots, turrets, and lasers...
• Navigate the space station in zero-gravity with precision and finesse...
• Collect bananas to progress through the station...
• And unleash their inner ape in the face of danger.

Will you face the challenge and be the first monkey to escape?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required.

short_description: Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game where you must unleash your inner ape to face 12 unique levels in space. Use skill and strategy to dodge lasers, evade enemies, and collect bananas in zero-gravity on your journey to escape a retro-styled evil space station.
